Detailed Description

Serialises and deserialises the WorldFIP data.

Used in the NanoFIP design.
On reception it depacketises the data and only presents the actual data contents. It also verifies the FCS (Frame Checksum, CRC).
On transmission it packetises the data and adds the FCS.
